name: Impressions on Hold (IOHI)
overview:
Founded in 1991, Impressions On Hold was a leader in the on-hold industry. As possibilities in technology grew, they made the switch to a new name, IOHI.

IOHI services range from on-hold messaging to overhead music and digital signage video displays.

IOHI core products and services include: IOHI On-Hold, on-hold messages and automated attendant, IVR and call tree greetings; IOHI AtmospheresÂ®, overhead/public space music; IOHI VideoCast, digital signage networks; IOHI StreamCast, demographically-targeted rich media email campaigns with click-thru reporting and list management; IOHI Sound Masking, Web Audio and video and IOHI StoreCast, allowing companies to add mini advertising campaigns interspersed within their IOHI AtmospheresÂ® custom-designed music channels.

milestones.description: IOHI announces merger with Audio Messaging Solutions
milestones.source_description: Audio Messaging Solutions Merges with IOHI, Forming Powerhouse in Audio-Video Marketing Industry
